DOCNAME: CASE OF BEKUZAROV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-3 - Length of pre-trial detention);Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-4 - Procedural guarantees of review)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .
CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the excessive length of their pre - trial detention . In application no . CARDINAL , the applicant also complained under LAW based on the same set of facts .
